name: Import Service Deployment app config via UI
description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Create new project via **API**.
- Import Service Deployment app config via UI.

### Verify that:

- Install required data is the same as in imported config.
descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Create new project via API.
  • Import Service Deployment app config via UI.

Verify that:

  • Install required data is the same as in imported config.
statusMessage:
AssertionError: [AssertionError] during step: Login via UI
Message: [AssertionError] during step: Verify Apps page displayed
Message: Apps page should be displayed!
statusTrace:
tests/reporting_hooks/reporting.py:49: in wrapper
    result = await func(*args, **kwargs)
             ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
tests/test_cases/steps/ui_steps/page_steps_impl/apps_page_steps.py:14: in verify_ui_page_displayed

           ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
E   AssertionError: Apps page should be displayed!
